headline: Is It Time To Reassess Invesco (IVZ) After Its Strong One Year Share Price Gain
summary: If you have been wondering whether Invesco's share price still reflects good value, looking closely at what you are actually paying for the business can be a useful next step. The stock last closed at US$26.53, with a 7 day return of a 2.3% decline, a 30 day return of a 1.5% decline, a year to date return of a 1.5% decline, and a 1 year return of 50.6%. This sits alongside a 3 year return of 56.0% and a 5 year return of 44.1%. Recent moves in the share price have come alongside ongoing...
